page.title: 12LONGBOROUGH PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The council meets at two monthly periods in the village hall.The chairman is Mr. C.H.Williams & the clerk is Mr.M.Borsay.The agenda for Sept. 1985 was: a)Fosseway Turn; roadmarkings onto the main road.b)Waterstyles footpath.c)The bank at Ashwell.d)Orchard House development - condition of the footpath at the entrance.e)Walnut tree at the Old Rectory.f)Naming of the new development.g)Parking next to the bus shelter.h)Lane adjoining the Old Rectory.i)Request for mirror at Bank's Fee entrance.j)Hole in road by Old Quarry.k)Telephone box.l)Evesham Journal correspondent.m)Airstrip at Little Barrow. The list reflects the particular role of a parish council in ensuring the protection of the environment & by debating local issues.
